title: Los Castellazos
description: Los Castellazos is an archaeological site located near Mediana de Aragón, Spain, in a strategic position on the Ginel river. Two phases of occupation relate to the Early Iron Age and the later first millennium BC.

properties.description: Representative modern location of Mediana de Aragón based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Mediana de Aragón
